duties_responsibilities.duty: Check product to ensure it meets quality standards and accurately sort and scan waste.
Maintain production standards and stock and clean shelves, bins, and food preparation areas.
Handle invoices for product delivered outside store receiving hours and report miss-picks to team leadership.
Receive product, aid in receiving and sorting overnight deliveries for other teams, and perform opening, mid, and closing duties as assigned.

Provide excellent customer service, address needs of customers in a timely manner, and maximize sales potential through effective procedures for prepping, storing, rotating, stocking, and merchandising product.

Follow and comply with established procedures, maintain a clean and sanitary working and shopping environment, ensure accuracy of signs and pricing, and immediately report safety hazards and violations.
